id: Content Creator Notion Template Pack | 5 Free Templates
name: Content Creator Notion Template Pack | 5 Free Templates
description: Manage your site and social media with these five free templates! Blog dashboard: write, schedule and plan blog post, bookmark resources, list contacts, save blog assets like fonts and logos, quickly access all your blog essentials in one place and more. ARC Book Tracker: track the advanced reader copies of books you have requested, reviewed and posted about. The Ultimate Content Creator's Brain Dump: dump all your content ideas in one place. About me page: use this as a link-in-bio or about me
features: Blog dashboard:write, schedule and plan blog post, bookmark resources, list contacts, save blog assets like fonts and logos, quickly access all your blog essentials in one place and more.; ARC Book Tracker:track the advanced reader copies of books you have requested, reviewed and posted about.; The Ultimate Content Creator's Brain Dump:dump all your content ideas in one place.; About me page:use this as a link-in-bio or about me page to show the books you are currently reading, your favourite podcast and more.; Free Link in Bio Template:easily share link and embed elements with your followers. Notion gives you more flexibility than other link-in-bio creators, and you can easily update it.
